content: pdf crochet pattern only - digital download - not a finished item it is a digital download pdf please note that no physical product will be shipped to you pride headband - this is the perfect accessory to wear to celebrate your pride wear it at a pride parade for everyday or even just to do your makeup pattern is written in english and uses us crochet terms this pattern is beginner friendly and includes step-by-step image instructions to guide you through the process supplies needed double knit acrylic yarn 4mm uk 8 - us g-6 crochet hook scissors darning needle stitches used chain single_crochet slip_stitch approximate measurements 4 5cm width 22 5cm length you can always contact me if you have any problems with the pattern indigo child clothing ltd ©2024
